rating_comment: Thanks to Nikha and Mom for hosting us! We really enjoyed our stay at Fuhang. The hospitality and food was amazing! It was home away from home. Keep "super"hosting! All the best!
Peaceful and stylish space! Lovely terrace! Was happy with the hospitality of the host!
Homely.

This is a second floor unit (no lift) - a fairly big room and bath, very clean. Location is about 6kms (15 minutes) from Bagdogra airport and a similar distance from the NJP Railway station. Google got us to the place correctly, but it took us a few minutes to identify in the dark. There is a railway track and a railway gate about 50m away but we did not get disturbed by the sound. The host's mother, who lives on the floor below, was kind enough to make us breakfast and also packed Parathas for us on our request. This was way more tastier than food at the airport or on the flight. She also called a local taxi driver to drop us at the airport. All in all, a very good stay and I would definitely recommend it to my friends.
Great place. I would recommend it to anyone.
Amazing host, lovely place and must try Aunty's handmade food. She is great to talk to and makes you feel at home. Book it without thinking twice.
Clean, warm, spacious and sociable. You hear one train pass by around 4 am, but it’s rather quick. Amenities are sufficient and the hosts are hospitable and warm.
Short & nice stay. Nikha’s mother ensured we had a smooth checkin & a nice stay ! Thanks aunty.

The accommodation was brilliant and the hosts mom is an amazing person. She was too sweet and hospitable and it was a pleasure staying at their place although we barely spent few hrs. The breakfast was amazing and right on time as we had to catch an early flight in the morning... We had paratha and alu dum.. it was yumm.. glad to recommend it to anyone who visits Bagdogra

We visited Nikha's place in December 2019. Nikha's mother was really sweet, and made sure we were comfortable.
The meals were lovingly cooked and delicious.
Totally recommend!

The place is just a 20 minutes drive to the airport. Though located a bit away from main city, all the materials of basic needs are available nearby. The place is kept very clean. The host’s mom is a amazing lady and has a solution to all the queries/requirements you may have.

I loved my stay at this place. Although Nikha was out of town at the moment, Aunty was very warm and welcoming. The studio apartment was very clean and efficient. It had everything from a heater to milk and coffee sachets! It even had a balcony with nice view! Was absolutely safe for female travellers. Theres also a small library of books to read from! Aunty is the sweetest, she helped me with getting an Auto the next morning with proper rates and ensured the travelling safety. Also, swiggu delivers at this place so you’re totally set for lunch and dinners! Would totally recommend!!
Nice place with a good terrace for a days layover at NJP/Siliguri. Half way B/w railway station and Airport. Good homely feel !
Amazing homestay , definitely worth the visit.
Excellent hospitality, excellent home made food, well located. Only 10 to 15 minutes from the airport
A good and clean place to stay. Very good host

Had a wonderful & comfortable stay. Thank you so much! While Nikha was out of town, she ensured all contact details were shared and helped accommodate for early check in as well as late checkout. Her’s is a lovely family, got to meet 4 generations under the same roof. Felt like home. Juni aunty is a great cook, her warmth reflected even in her food. Would surely stay again :)

Nikha and her family are great host. You will feel like being at home. Very well maintained property with cleanliness and hygiene maintained. Food was amazing. We were craving for home food after Bhutan's trip and it was truly delicious and Maa ke haath ka food. We still remember morning breakfast and unable to forgot tase of that yummy Aalu Dum. Nikha you and your family are truly Superhost.
Great place with a great host. Would totally recommend!
Very spacious with all amenities. Food was great. Host was extremely friendly!

Like many other described, Nikha’s home is like your own. Her mother took good care of us and feed us delicious dishes for two full days. One of the best, if not the best in India. Thank you very much!

Nikha place is clean and nice. We had a brief stay. It's 20 min from the bagdogra airport and is a good stayover/layover place. The breakfast cooled by her mom for us was really delicious. Will recommend this place.

There was a bit of a miscommunication upon my arrival and check-in so it took a bit of time until I got the official "greeting", but everything got squared away right after check-in and the rest of my 2-night stay there was wonderful. I needed to be close to Bagdogra airport at the time so location was good enough for me. Nikha was very responsive from the time I booked up until check in. Junie (the mother) and Geta (the daughter/sister) of Nikha were very hospitable and kind. Junie knows how to cook authentic food with a reasonable cost. I needed to get to the airport really early so Junie offered to give me a ride at a good price as well. If I need to come back to stay close to the airport, I would recommend staying with this family.
Great space, the terrace overlooks a field and the railway track which has its own charm. Had a great time here
